name: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio website to showcase my projects, skills, and experience. Built with React and TypeScript.

name: Used Car Price Prediction
description: Machine learning project to predict used car prices based on various features using regression models.

name: Housing Analysis in Brazil
description: Data analysis project exploring housing trends and prices in Brazil using Python and visualization libraries.

name: Faulty Calculator
description: A fun calculator app that sometimes gives incorrect results on purpose, built with Python.

name: Guessing a Number
description: A simple number guessing game implemented in Python for practicing logic and loops.

name: Weather Info
description: A React app that fetches and displays real-time weather information for any city.

name: Olympic Analysis
description: Data analysis and visualization of Olympic Games statistics using Python and Pandas.

name: Text Summarizer
description: A tool that uses NLP techniques to automatically summarize long pieces of text.

name: Snake Water Gun Game
description: A Python implementation of the classic Snake Water Gun game (like Rock Paper Scissors).

name: Dynamic Student Enrollment Form
description: A dynamic React form for enrolling students, featuring validation and real-time feedback.

name: Breast Cancer Prediction
description: A machine learning project to predict breast cancer using classification algorithms.

name: Inventory Management System
description: A web-based inventory management system to track products, stock, and orders.
